full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 203 of 236 1107 LC3Cmax7 Parkinson - cross 1 298. 2 Q. So if you look at where it says "staff," that room we just looked at, if you go to the right, all the way to the right, the room on the far right-hand side is called the lake room; right? 3 4 5 A. I'm sorry. I'm still back in the staff room. 6 7 MR. EVERDELL: If we can take down the call-out, 8 please, to see the full floor plan. 9 Q. Are we looking at the full floor plan, Mr. Parkinson? 10 A. True. 11 Q. You see the room that's labeled "staff"? 12 A. I do. 13 Q. That's on the left side of the floor plan towards the 14 bottom; right? 15 A. That would pretty much be the northeast corner. 16 Q. Northeast corner? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. And if you go to the right-hand side of the floor plan, the 19 northwest corner, that's the lake room; right? 20 A. True. 21 Q. And that is the room where we saw Mr. Epstein's desk in the 22 photos that we just talked about; right? 23 A. Well, there were multiple desks. Do you mean the one that 24 the money was taken from? 25 Q. The one that the money was taken from, yes. SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012717
